onboarding.purposeDescription: Guided by our faith and commitment to service, we strive to make a meaningful difference in communities worldwide.
onboarding.motto: In GOD with Service to Humanity
onboarding.mottoDescription: Our guiding principle that shapes everything we do
onboarding.missionDescription: SCPC's mission is to provide spiritual guidance, support humanitarian efforts, and facilitate peace-building initiatives in collaboration with international and local partners. This underscores our commitment to service, faith, and partnership.
onboarding.missionPoint1: Providing spiritual guidance and support to communities in need
onboarding.missionPoint2: Facilitating peace-building initiatives across diverse communities
onboarding.missionPoint3: Collaborating with international and local partners for greater impact
onboarding.visionDescription: Our vision guides everything we do, from our daily operations to our long-term strategic planning. We strive to embody our core belief in service to humanity through faith-based initiatives and create a world where spiritual guidance and humanitarian support reach all who need it.
onboarding.visionQuote: We envision a world where peace, compassion, and spiritual well-being are accessible to all, transcending borders and differences to unite humanity in shared purpose and understanding.
onboarding.coreValuesDescription: These four pillars guide every SCPC activity and define our approach to service.
onboarding.integrityDescription: Unwavering honesty and ethical conduct in all our actions and decisions, building trust with communities we serve.
onboarding.respectDescription: Treating every individual with dignity regardless of background or belief, honoring the diversity of humanity.
onboarding.compassionDescription: Empathy and care for those in need, driving our humanitarian efforts and guiding our approach to service.
onboarding.collaborationDescription: Creating impact through partnerships with communities, governments, and organizations to achieve shared goals.
onboarding.partnersDescription: Working alongside respected international organizations to achieve our shared goals of peace, security, and humanitarian support.
onboarding.ihrcDescription: Partnering with IHRC for human-rights advocacy and protection of vulnerable populations in conflict zones.
onboarding.interpolDescription: Collaborating with INTERPOL for global law-enforcement cooperation and security initiatives across borders.
onboarding.unDescription: Supporting the United Nations SDGs initiative to promote sustainable development and peace worldwide.
onboarding.nsaDescription: Working with local security agencies to ensure safety and stability in communities across Nigeria.
onboarding.initiativesDescription: Core programs that fulfill our mission of spiritual guidance and humanitarian support.
onboarding.spiritualCounselingDescription: Providing guidance and support for individuals and communities facing spiritual and emotional challenges, helping them find peace and purpose.
onboarding.interfaithDialogueDescription: Fostering understanding and reconciliation among different faith traditions to build peaceful communities and promote tolerance and respect.
onboarding.humanitarianAidDescription: Supporting populations through crisis response and longer-term development projects grounded in our faith-based mission to serve humanity.
onboarding.peaceDescription: Working with local and international security agencies to create safe environments and promote peaceful coexistence in communities affected by conflict and instability.
onboarding.nigeriaCommandDescription: Operating in twenty-eight Nigerian states, providing spiritual guidance,ensuring peace, safety, and humanitarian support.
onboarding.regionalCommandDescription: Expanding our global footprint with commands in Nigeria and the United States.
onboarding.joinMissionDescription: Follow our streamlined application process to become part of the Special Chaplain Peace Corps.
onboarding.createAccountDescription: Register with your email and password or use social logins like Google and Facebook for a seamless experience. Your account will be your gateway to all SCPC services.
onboarding.purchaseFormDescription: Complete your application by purchasing the form through our secure payment gateway. This step confirms your commitment to joining our mission.
onboarding.takeAssessmentDescription: Complete a five-question, computer-based exam within fifteen minutes (average three minutes per question). This assessment helps us understand your aptitude and place you in the right role.
onboarding.receiveRoleDescription: Based on your score: 0-30% for Constable (CST), 31-60% for Regular Recruitment Course (RRC), 61-100% for Regular Executive Course (REC). Each role has unique responsibilities and opportunities.
onboarding.accessPortalDescription: Get immediate access to your results and orientation materials for your assigned role. Begin your journey with the Special Chaplain Peace Corps and make a difference.
onboarding.readyDifferenceDescription: Join the Special Chaplain Peace Corps and be part of our mission to provide spiritual guidance and humanitarian support to communities around the world.

slide1.title: Spiritual Guidance
slide1.subtitle: Special Chaplain Peace Corps
slide1.description: Dedicated to providing spiritual guidance, support, and leadership in peace and humanitarian operations around the globe.

slide2.title: Building Peace
slide2.subtitle: Through Faith & Service
slide2.description: Facilitating peace-building initiatives in collaboration with international and local partners to create lasting change.

slide3.title: Global Presence
slide3.subtitle: Expanding Our Reach
slide3.description: With operations in 28 Nigerian states and our first United States Command, we're bringing spiritual support wherever it's needed.

slide4.title: Join Our Corps
slide4.subtitle: Make A Difference
slide4.description: Become part of our mission through our streamlined application process and help us serve communities worldwide.
